stanzas: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases. His mercies never come to an end! They are new every morning, new every morning. Great is thy faithfulness, O Lord! Great is thy faithfulness.
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases. His mercies never come to an end! They are new every morning, new every morning. Great is thy faithfulness, O Lord! Great is thy faithfulness.
They are new every morning, new every morning. Great is thy faithfulness, O Lord! Great is thy faithfulness.
They are new every morning, new every morning. Great is thy faithfulness, O Lord! Great is thy faithfulness.
